channel.title: Duel Arena Rules Don't Work?
channel.description:
For some reason, my duel arena rules don't work. I have 2 problems:
1. This is what the duel looks like when there are no rules [IMG]http://i883.photobucket.com/albums/ac38/Summer_Snow1200/BlueRules.jpg[/img]
2. This is what the duel looks like when there are rules [IMG]http://i883.photobucket.com/albums/ac38/Summer_Snow1200/RedRules.jpg[/img]
How do I change it from switching text color to a little check mark in the circle?
Also, the rules don't even work. How do I fix that?

item.title: Duel Arena Rules Don't Work?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

remove the @red@ from the if statement and make it load the check through your client/cache; you may need to code it in and add the sprite.

Read full topic
